title.label: Unable to play on iPhone 8 Plus

content.label: The game UI doesn‚Äôt work on iPhone 8 Plus. You can‚Äôt click on the buttons to even start the game as the UI is not aligned properly. I don‚Äôt know if there will be an update to fix this. I love this game on Android, too bad it doesn‚Äôt work on my iPhone.

Great game when it works. On the iPhone 8 the screen comes up and cuts in half. You can‚Äôt get past the character select because the key board is off and won‚Äôt allow you to put a name in. I really hope this is fixed because I do like the game.
It's a good game but Can I please waste money on this game!! Please! My car is slow and I need a faster car but I don't have enough money in this game.
I love this game! So many cars and customizations make you feel in control.
I enjoyed it and they also have many different cars and customization options.
Love it!!!

No sound in the game on ipad3 running 9.3.5.  Neat gameplay and interesting car customizations possible, but extremely (almost impossibly) hard to beat the top AI racer in each race while being too easy to beat all of the other AI racers; nice idea but poor implementation of the automatically-adjusting difficulty setting.  And... No sound!

Come on. Gimme a break. No sound?

title.label: Would be great, but no sound

content.label:
No sound on iPhone 6s running the latest 10.3.2 iOS. And I will never be a fan of on-screen controls. 

Otherwise this is a perfectly executed iso racer. Love the art and feel.
Sound doesn't work (iPhone 4  ios 7.1.2)
Very enjoying game but no major updates since more than 2 years or so
Cool enough game but sound does not work
Controls are easy to learn. All sorts of things to do. Cups, arcade, normal. More modes. Every thing you would want in a racing game. Get it now!
I have bought 8 dollars of in app purchases and the game restarted me and they r gone pls help I will give better rating if fixed
Tried all the controls and they all were lousy.If you have to work hard to adjust to the controls then the controls are lousy.

To the reviewer who wrote that the on-screen control buttons are now in the way of gameplay: Go to options and move them where you like! There are also other control methods available, including tilt. I have a 6s Plus and this is still a great game!

Reckless 1 was ok but too limited.  I'm reluctant to try no 3 because of all the negative reviews.  But Pixelbite got everything right in no 2.  It is, in my opinion, the best racing game EVER.  The graphics are remarkable.  Handling is great.  Flawless and fun.  I don't know why so many had crashing problems - no problems on my mini 2.  It's close to being the perfect game.
Wait a minute!  After iOS 9, I'm having the same problem - game crashes back to the home screen.  What a shame.  Pay no attention to the glowing review above.  I revise my 5 stars to 1.  If I could give 0 I would, cause the game's no good to me if I can't play. Deleting.
Revising again: reloaded and I'm delighted to say it works now.  All is forgiven.  You're still the best and back to 5 stars.
And I have no 3 now.  It's good too.
The accelerator and brakes are set on the half of the screen and not close to the edge. It's impossible to drive like this. The steering controls are in the correct spot.

title.label: Used to be the best. Now it's unplayable.

content.label: I re downloaded this app because I loved it so much back when it was first released. Now it crashes in the middle of the race every time without fail. Unplayable. Do not buy this game
Keeps crashing in middle of races. Too bad, looked and felt good.
App crashes

title.label: Great game and would love feature tweaks.

content.label: Love this game! I come back to it time and again. The first game is great in its own right. Wish we were able to scale buttons as my finger often "slips off" accelerator or hits wrong steering direction. Also does occasionally crash on my 6 plus.

title.label: Best if not for crashing glitch

content.label: This game is tops... Or rather would be if it didn't crash on my ipad mini 15-20 seconds into each race. No... That's not frustrating at all. Where is RR1 btw??? Can anyone recommend any other top-down racers? I'm through with Pixelbite. They used to be a contedaarrhhh. Now: hogwarsch.

I originally bought this game back when it came out I don't know how long ago. When I say RR3 PPP up on the storefront I decided this would be fun to install and play again, especially on my new iPhone 6 Plus. The last time I played was on an iPhone 4. So, at first it was perfect. Game ran smooth and it looked incredible. But as of recent, which is less than a day later and probably half way through the career, I can't even get through a race or upgrading a car before it just crashes back to the home screen.

I've thought about just giving up. Uninstalling, or just buying the new RR3. But, my fear is that if this tried and true game doesn't work. Why would I want to buy the new one.

Fix the crashes and this game gets 5 stars, because that is what it deserves.

The game is super fun and very addicting but the game crashes every single time i open the app.... The game crashes and I had to start over the progress I had made and it has done this multiple times I have the newest version of IOS 8 and it still does this can someone please fix this but the game is the best racing game ever just fix the crashes so I can play the game

title.label: Best Racing Game on iPad that I've Played

content.label: Worth playing for the Drift challenges alone. Games come and go on my iPad, but I always keep coming back to this one. I can not comment on other versions, but you will not be disappointed with this one. I prefer using the onscreen controls than the tilt option.

title.label: Clearly the best of the franchise

content.label: Download this rr and not the other ones.

This game is great, reminds me of Super Sprint from when I was younger.
